Title: Higepiyo
Description: ['Higepiyo is a little chick with a mustache, who is seeking to aquire masculinity with his friend Hiroshi but ends up being entangled with a skin of heated milk.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Highschool of the Dead', 'Side story: Highschool of the Dead: Drifters of the Dead']
Voices: ['Park, Romi', 'Kobayashi, Yuu', 'Kumai, Motoko', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Arai, Satomi', 'Miyashita, Eiji']
